attributes.action: Discuss reciprocal health arrangements for UK citizens living in the EU
attributes.additional_details: This is high on the list for fellow uk citizens living in Spain and other EU countries - Spain has committed to continue their health arrangement by Royal Decree for 2 months and continue if reciprocated.
attributes.background: EU countries will provide UK citizens living in the EU with Health Care providing the UK Reciprocate with EU citizens living in the UK - This could be lost with a hard BREXIT or lost if the UK fails to include it within any deal arrangements

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do regarding reciprocal healthcare. 
	
You could start a new petition calling on the Government to provide EU citizens living in the UK with Health Care as part of any Brexit deal or No Deal arrangements, if that is what you'd like to see happen.
